alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Coke; Coleman; Jones; Runnels; Shackelford; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 11:32PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Coke, Callahan, southeastern Jones, northwestern Coleman, southern Shackelford, eastern Taylor and northern Runnels Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1132 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mccarty Lake to Ovalo to Maverick. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Clyde, Winters, Albany, Baird, Maverick, Wylie, Tuscola, Buffalo Gap, Lawn, Moran, Novice, Dudley, Ibex, Bradshaw, Hatchel, Eula, Potosi, Norton and Hamby. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 287 and 314. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Callahan; Coke; Coleman; Jones; Runnels; Shackelford; Taylor
